elements.label: Element used by the tide to count the passing of time.
Destination
elements.description: A place we can sail to.

elements.label: Unavailable Destination
elements.description: For some reason, this place isn't available to us.

elements.label: Tune
elements.description: All songs start with the first notes.

elements.label: Mystery
elements.description: Something paradoxical or confusing. But there is something here, if I can figure out the way to the truth.

elements.label: Story Source
elements.description: I can learn a story from here

elements.label: Letter
elements.description: A letter to deliver to someone.

elements.label: Manifested Influences
elements.description: An influence over people and the local environment, most commonly made manifest by music.

elements.label: Crowd
elements.description: All these noses turned the same way... This turns into power in the hands of a radical or of an artist.

elements.label: Curse Concealer
elements.description: This is a concealer element used to conceal curses.

elements.label: Potential Muse
elements.description: This person has what it takes to inspire me.

elements.label: Passive Benefit
elements.description: Some assistance is granted without it being actively sought.
